mapper.sql: id, name, account, password, salt, groupid, lastloginip, lastlogintime, logincount, addtime
mapper.select: select from admingroup g where g.id=#{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into admin (id, name, account, password, salt, groupid, lastloginip, lastlogintime, logincount, addtime) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update admin
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lastloginip = #{lastloginip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastlogintime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
logincount = #{logincount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id}
